meanings.definition: A document awarded by an educational institution certifying the recipient has completed a course of study.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her diplomas on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The university handed out diplomas to the graduates.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the stack of diplomas, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: His collection of diplomas was a testament to his hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The shiny diplomas gleamed under the bright lights of the ceremony.

meanings.definition: A certificate of completion or achievement.
meanings.sent1: The framed diplomas hung above his desk.
meanings.sent2: She framed her diplomas and hung them in her office.
meanings.sent3: The diplomas were so beautifully framed that they looked like artwork.
meanings.sent4: His diplomas were like trophies, showcasing his accomplishments.
meanings.sent5: The diplomas served as a reminder of all the hard work he had put in.
